verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Egypt <WH4714> for help, <WH5833> [And] rely <WH8172> on horses, <WH5483> And trust <WH982> in chariots <WH7393> because <WH3588> they are many, <WH7227> And in horsemen <WH6571> because <WH3588> they are very <WH3966> strong, <WH6105> But they do not look <WH8159> to the Holy <WH6918> One <WH6918> of Israel, <WH3478> nor <WH3808> seek <WH1875> the Lord! <WH3068>

Yet He also <WH1571> is wise <WH2450> and will bring <WH935> disaster, <WH9563> And does not retract <WH5493> His words, <WH1697> But will arise <WH6965> against <WH5921> the house <WH1004> of evildoers, <WH7489> And against <WH5921> the help <WH5833> of the workers <WH6466> of iniquity. <WH205>

Now the Egyptians <WH4714> are men, <WH120> and not God, <WH410> And their horses <WH5483> are flesh <WH1320> and not spirit; <WH7307> So the Lord <WH3068> will stretch <WH5186> out His hand, <WH3027> And he who helps <WH5826> will stumble <WH3782> And he who is helped <WH5826> will fall, <WH5307> And all <WH3605> of them will come <WH3615> to an end <WH3615> together. <WH9191>

For thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> to me, "As the lion <WH9030> or the young <WH3715> lion <WH3715> growls <WH1897> over <WH5921> his prey, <WH2964> Against <WH5921> which <WH834> a band <WH4393> of shepherds <WH7462> is called <WH7121> out, Will not be terrified <WH2865> at their voice, <WH6963> nor <WH3808> disturbed <WH6031> at their noise, <WH1995> So <WH3651> will the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> come <WH3381> down <WH3381> to wage <WH6633> war <WH6633> on Mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726> and on its hill. <WH1389>"

Like flying <WH5774> birds <WH6833> so <WH3651> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> will protect <WH1598> Jerusalem. <WH3389> He will protect <WH1598> and deliver <WH5337> [it;] He will pass <WH6452> over <WH6452> and rescue <WH4422> [it.]
Return <WH7725> to Him from whom <WH834> you have deeply <WH6009> defected, <WH5627> O sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

For in that day <WH3117> every <WH376> man <WH376> will cast <WH3988> away <WH3988> his silver <WH3701> idols <WH457> and his gold <WH2091> idols, <WH457> which <WH834> your hands <WH3027> have made <WH6213> as a sin. <WH2399>

And the Assyrian <WH804> will fall <WH5307> by a sword <WH2719> not of man, <WH376> And a sword <WH2719> not of man <WH120> will devour <WH398> him. So he will not escape <WH5127> the sword, <WH2719> And his young <WH970> men <WH970> will become <WH1961> forced <WH4522> laborers. <WH4522>

"And his rock <WH5553> will pass <WH5674> away <WH5674> because <WH4480> of panic, <WH4032> And his princes <WH8269> will be terrified <WH2865> at the standard, <WH5251>" Declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> whose <WH834> fire <WH217> is in Zion <WH6726> and whose furnace <WH8574> is in Jerusalem. <WH3389>
